thread.title: Why Loyola-Chicago’s Locker Room Looks Like a TV Detective Show

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Why Loyola-Chicago’s Locker Room Looks Like a TV Detective Show
text:
SAN ANTONIO—The room is covered wall-to-wall in jumbo-sized pieces of paper. On the sheets are head-shot photos of young men and scribbles written in code.
This is not the crazy bulletin board in every detective show, with the collage of clues and connections in a potential conspiracy. It’s the Loyola-Chicago locker room. The unusual wallpaper is how the Ramblers learn the plays and habits of opponents.
The...
